articles.description: World number one Nelly Korda leads from the front as the United States dominate a disappointing Europe on the opening day of the Solheim Cup at Robert Trent Jones Golf Club.
articles.title: Solheim Cup 2024: US lead Europe 6-2 after sensational opening day in Virginia

articles.description: Liam Livingstone smashes a superb 87 from 47 balls to lead England to a series-levelling three-wicket win over Australia in the second T20.
articles.title: England vs Australia: Liam Livingstone smashes hosts to victory in second T20

articles.description: Pep Guardiola says he is happy the hearing into Manchester City's alleged breaches of Premier League financial rules will begin on Monday.
articles.title: Man City hearing: Manager Pep Guardiola 'happy' 115 charges case begins on Monday

articles.description: New USA coach Mauricio Pochettino targets winning the World Cup and says they should be inspired by the country's women's team and 'best coach in the world' Emma Hayes.
articles.title: Pochettino targets World Cup win with USA

articles.description: Jack Draper cannot inspire Great Britain to a Davis Cup comeback win over Argentina as his first match since reaching the US Open semi-finals ends in defeat.
articles.title: Davis Cup 2024: Jack Draper and Dan Evans beaten as Great Britain lose to Argentina

articles.description: Great Britain’s Charlie Dobson produces a stunning run in the Diamond League season finale in Brussels to win the men’s 400 metres.
articles.title: Diamond League final: Charlie Dobson claims surprise 400m win in Brussels

articles.description: Red Bull’s Max Verstappen pips Mercedes’ Lewis Hamilton to the fastest time in an incident-packed first practice in Azerbaijan.
articles.title: Azerbaijan GP: Max Verstappen fastest as Charles Leclerc crashes

articles.description: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola says he is "happy" the hearing into the club's 115 charges for alleged breaches of the Premier League's financial rules will begin on Monday, 16 September.
articles.title: Manchester City hearing: Pep Guardiola 'happy' case will be heard from Monday

articles.description: NI secretary says there is "a significant risk that it would not be built in time" for Euro 2028.
articles.title: Casement Park: UK government will not fund rebuild for 2028

articles.description: Manchester United boss Erik ten Hag says he is still relying on Casemiro despite the midfielder's "bad day at the office" against Liverpool.
articles.title: Manchester United: Erik ten Hag still 'needs' Casemiro despite 'bad day'
